laboratory_examinations.findings: Typical T wave alternans, markedly prolonged QT-intervals (RR=570 ms, QT=501 ms, QTc=664 ms).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Slightly prolonged QTc at the age of 5 (RR=559 ms, QT=346 ms, QTc=462 ms).

laboratory_examinations.findings: No congenital heart defects nor hypertrophy.
Identified a novel heterozygous missense variant p.R412M in CACNA1C, confirmed as pathogenic.
